sense.gloss: embellishment (e.g. of a story), ornamentation, decoration
reducing to pieces, crushing, smashing, demolishing
baby formula, infant formula, formula, baby milk
powdered skim milk, skimmed milk powder, non-fat dry milk
mineral dust, mine dust, fine particles, dust
flour made using wheat imported from America
kinako, roasted soybean flour, roasted soy flour
bread flour (high gluten), strong flour, hard flour
shiruko, sweet red-bean soup with mochi
artificial pollination, hand pollination, mechanical pollination
to work assiduously, to give one's all, to make the utmost effort, to make (grind) one's body into dust
x: 身を粉にする・みをこにする

sense.gloss: crushed rice, tiny pieces of rice
